name: Peryton
lore: A peryton is a vicious predator that combines the features of a stag and an eagle. It hunts humanoids relentlessly, driven by an unnatural craving for mortal hearts. A peryton's shadow on the ground appears as a humanoid silhouette until the creature consumes a fresh heart, after which the shadow briefly reflects its true form.

traits.name: Dive Attack
traits.description: If the peryton is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a Gore attack on the same turn, the attack deals an extra 9 (2d8) Piercing damage to the target.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.description: The peryton doesn't provoke Opportunity Attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Keen Sight and Smell
traits.description: The peryton has Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

multiattack.description: The peryton makes one Gore attack and one Talon attack.

actions.name: Gore
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Talon
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) Piercing damage.
